# CheckOptionsAttribute

## ViewTableInvalidReference

<!-- 'Description' and 'Properties' sections are auto-generated. -->
<!-- DON'T TOUCH ME - I'M USED BY VALIDATOR DOC AUTO-GENERATION CODE -->

### Details

[View option](https://docs.dataminer.services/develop/schemadoc/Protocol/Protocol.Params.Param.ArrayOptions-options.html#view) should refer to an existing table, excluding view tables.
